1611030.name: Vampirem Demo
1611030.description:
The Vampirem Demo allows players to experience a small portion of what Vampirem is all about. Vampire dungeon crawler where the player will explore a dark dungeon filled with traps, loot and treasure.

Features


  • All loot is random
  • Every play-through is different
  • Dynamic stats on all equipment
  • Loot categorized as Magic, Rare, Epic and Legendary
  • Traps, puzzles, treasure and much more
  • Interesting characters (Fully Voiced)
1611030.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
